docs.lead_paragraph: A race for governor has led to second-guessing over the candidate’s biographical omissions and has sparked a debate about a woman’s balance of work, ambition and parenthood.

headline.main: Life Story of Wendy Davis Swings From Strength to Flash Point in Texas Campaign
headline.print_headline: Candidate’s Life Story Swings From Strength to Flash Point

docs.abstract: Controversy over whether Texas State Sen Wendy Davis fudged items in her biography has turned her underdog campaign to become Texas’s first Democratic governor in 20 years into a hotbed of second-guessing; has also prompted a debate over culturally charged questions about a woman’s balance of work, ambition and parenthood.
docs.snippet: A race for governor has led to second-guessing over the candidate’s biographical omissions and has sparked a debate about a woman’s balance of work, ambition and parenthood.

docs.lead_paragraph: Julie Davis has every reason to be skeptical of Obamacare: She's a Republican, her father is a physician who is wary of socialized medicine and her insurance was canceled because of new requirements imposed by the healthcare law this year.
